abstract: Novartis on Tuesday showed growing interest in pursuing takeovers, just as its core pharmaceuticals business suffered the most severe competition to date from lower-priced generic rival products.
lead_paragraph: Novartis on Tuesday showed growing interest in pursuing takeovers, just as its core pharmaceuticals business suffered the most severe competition to date from lower-priced generic rival products.

headline.main: Novartis May Seek More Deals to Boost Growth
